casebody.data:
MARGARET ELIZABETH MITCHELL, by Her Father and Next Friend, WARREN N. MITCHELL, vs. DR. JOHN D. BLAKE. Action for damages for negligence of attending physician. The order in this case affirmed the judgment of the Court below, withdrawing the case from the jury, with costs to the appellee. Decided January 11, 1911. Appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of .Baltimore City (Heuisber, J.).

The cause was argued before Boyd, O. J., Briscoe, Pearce, Burke, Thomas, Schmucker, Pattison and TJrner, JJ.

Edwin L. Ward and William Colton, for the appellant. James Upshur Dennis and S. S. Field, for the appellee. Pearce, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
